name.ja: <ruby>英魂の憑依<rt>レジェンド・ポゼスト</rt></ruby>

summoning_condition.en: This card is treated as a Legend Card while in the hand or Graveyard.

requirement.en: During a turn you have not activated "Legend Possessed".

effect.en: Ritual Summon "Legend Lineage Magician" by sending monsters from your hand and/or field to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal 10 or more as material (you cannot use more monsters than necessary as material). You cannot use non-Legend monsters in the hand as material by this effect.
